doc.field: Administrative Papers of Chancellor George Bugliarello
Administrative Papers of Chancellor George Bugliarello

This series contains published and unpublished scholarly articles and manuscripts written and edited by George Bugliarello as well as his handwritten notes and research material he used for various publications. The publications and reports have been assigned a number based on a numbering system adopted by the Chancellor's office to keep track of publications. A list of these publications has been inserted in the front of Box 28 for reference.
Administrative Papers of Chancellor George Bugliarello
